text: Stephen Ronald McKean ( â€“ 3 May 2021) was an American-born New Zealand basketball coach. He first moved to New Zealand in 1971. He was coach of the New Zealand men's national basketball team. He also coached in the New Zealand NBL and was the league's coach of the year in 1992. McKean was married and had a daughter. He died of cancer on 3 May 2021 in New Plymouth. He was 77. ==References== ==Other websites== *Steve McKean college statistics at Sports- Reference.com Category:1940s births Category:2021 deaths Category:American basketball players Category:Basketball coaches Category:New Zealand sportspeople
title: Steve McKean
